overview: Democratic Senator Jen Hanlon is poised to become the first woman president of the United States, until a scandal erupts that could potentially destroy her entire political career. Her opponent, Republican senator Trip Mathis will stop at nothing to see Jen fall from grace, unaware that his tactics will bring forth a horrible tragedy...Starring Brandi Love as Senator Hanlon; Julia Ann as Senator Hanlonâ€™s secret lover, Supreme Court Justice Beth Pellegrino; Alec Knight as Republican Senator Trip Mathis; Penny Pax; Casey Calvert; Kira Noir; Lyra Law and Karlie Montana. With Dana Vespoli and Brock Doom.
title: The Candidate
